### Primary button

<Types grid={true}>
  <Type>
    <Example>
      <button class="if button primary">Enabled</button>
    </Example>
    <Description>
      <span class="if title">Enabled</span>
    </Description>
  </Type>
  <Type>
    <Example>
      <button class="if button primary" disabled>
        Disabled
      </button>
    </Example>
    <Description>
      <span class="if title">Disabled</span>
    </Description>
  </Type>
  <Type>
    <Example>
      <button class="if button primary is-active">Active</button>
    </Example>
    <Description>
      <span class="if title">Active</span>
    </Description>
  </Type>
  <Type>
    <Example>
      <button class="if button primary is-hovered">Hovered</button>
    </Example>
    <Description>
      <span class="if title">Hovered</span>
    </Description>
  </Type>
  <Type>
    <Example>
      <button class="if button primary is-focused">Focused with keyboard</button>
    </Example>
    <Description>
      <span class="if title">Focused</span>
    </Description>
  </Type>
  <Type>
    <Example>
      <button class="if button primary is-focused is-hovered">Hover+keyboard focus</button>
    </Example>
    <Description>
      <span class="if title">Hover + focus</span>
    </Description>
  </Type>
</Types>
